text: @GOPLeader Answer first: Why did the Trump Admin allow large corporations to dip into the $350 billion Small Business COVID19 funding? And leave millions of small businesses with no loans available? Why didn’t you stop banks loaning to their clients first? https://t.co/4XQpeuBRrD
